title: Voucher Schema
description: Schema for validating voucher data from ProHandel API

branchNumber.description: Branch number where the voucher was issued

customerNumber.description: Customer number associated with the voucher

date.description: Date when the voucher was issued

validFrom.description: Date from which the voucher is valid

validTo.description: Date until which the voucher is valid

amountUsed.description: Amount of the voucher that has been used

staffNumber.description: Staff number who issued the voucher

cashRegisterNumber.description: Cash register number where the voucher was issued

receiptNumber.description: Receipt number associated with the voucher

lastChange.description: Last change timestamp of the voucher
